content: Can someone please help me fix my permissions on the RFC repo? I have write access, but some kind of branch protection prevents me from merging. The error message isn't clear exactly why.
you need to be 'admin' to override branch protection. normally those are gated on CI of some sort, but it seems strange for RFCs to have CI :confused:
I think the "maintain" access level would also work, though I'm not an expert on GitHub permissions.
